#Problem 1
##Reading and cleaning the Mr. Trashwheel Sheet
```{r}
library(readxl)
trashwheel_data = read_excel(
  "./hw2_data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx", 
  sheet = 1, 
  range = "A2:N406",
  ) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  drop_na(dumpster) %>%
  mutate(sports_balls = as.integer(sports_balls))
```
